TopicTitle: How do I simply remove a body's ocean?

Articles.Content: I'm using Scatterer and Sigma Eve Recolour which don't like each other very much, and Eve's ocean is now glitched and invisible, plus, I want Eve to be more Venus-like in physical properties anyway, so how do I completely remove its' oceans?

You can use a Kopernicus config like this: 

@Kopernicus
{
	@Body[Eve]
	{
		@Template
		{
			removeOcean = true
		}
		!Ocean{}
	}
}

You'll also need to remove Eve's ocean properties in Scatterer, if for no other reason as to have Scatterer not try to make one. I think deleting Eve's ocean.cfg would do.

So I'm assuming I paste that into Notepad++ and save it as a .cfg, and if so, what directory do I save it in?
Assuming you have Kopernicus and its dependencies installed, you can make your own folder inside GameData, and put this file in there.
